text: Blackface minstrel shows have been defined as “a form of expropriation, by which Black people were divested of their own cultural representation, through the business of staging or manufacturing race.” Eric Lott, "‘The Seeming Counterfeit’: Racial Politics and Early Blackface Minstrelsy," American Quarterly 43, no. 2 (1991): 223–54, https://doi.org/10.2307/2712925.
